title: Loot and crafting causing PVP DC.
body: So me and several of my OCE friends have been having the same continued issue where EVERY single time we wish to try and create something, visiting this tab causes us to Disconnect from PVP.Net and not only that but then bug out logging back in until my account has realised i'm not actually disconnected and trying to reconnect to the crafting page. When is this going  to be fixed? It is honestly driving me crazy.
